channel.title: CVE Feed for xwiki -- XWiki Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xwiki -- XWiki Platform

item.title: CVE-2020-11057|2024-08-04T11:21:14.645Z -- xwiki -- xwiki%20platform
item.description: In XWiki Platform 7.2 through 11.10.2, registered users without scripting/programming permissions are able to execute python/groovy scripts while editing personal dashboards. This has been fixed 11.3.7 , 11.10.3 and 12.0.
